summary: An experimental documentary that uses archival footage, interviews, and fictionalized scenarios to tell the story of the people around Jeffrey Dahmer, during the summer of his arrest in 1991.
cast: Andrew Swant|Pamela Bass|Jeffrey Jentzen|Pat Kennedy|Tom Ashbrook|Peter Batchelder|Todd Bishop|Dick Blau|Mark Borchardt|Brenda Bowen-Avant|Matt Brush|Bryan Cherry|Candace Cherry|Bobby Ciraldo|Patrick Connelly|Jeffrey Dahmer|Jason Deprez|Ryan Glass|Jennie Greenlee|Bruce Hood|John|Nikki Johnson|Ken Keen|Daniel Kelly|Anthony Keys|Richard Kohloff|Jason Kripps|Lacy Landre|Frankie Latina|Xav Leplae|Shayne Meyer|L. Dugan Nichols|Ryan Plato|Jamaal Robinson|Kent Schoonover|Nick Sommer|Wayne Taylor|Tara Van Laeken|Harrison Willow|Penny Zaworski|Biju Zimmerman
title: The Jeffrey Dahmer Files
